Speaker Profile

Angel Recaman

Director of Engineering and Innovation of Navantia

Navantia

Manuel Ángel Recamán Rivas is the Director of Engineering and Innovation of Navantia, and a member of the Committee of Corporate Management. He was trained as a Naval Engineer by the Technical School Superior of Naval Engineers in 1979, earned his Doctorate from the University of La Coruña in 1999 and his Master PDE from IESE in 2002 . He was Professor of Piping Systems at “EU Naval Technical Engineering” 1984-1985.

Sessions

    Research and Innovation Roundtable
